column5: desc
mage get a 50% attack bonus over warrior.
warrior get a 50% attack bonus over skill.
skill get a 50% attack bonus over mage.
warrior get a 25% attack bonus over mage.
skill get a 25% attack bonus over warrior.
mage get a 25% attack bonus over skill.
fire unit get a 25% attack bonus on earth unit.
earth unit get a 25% attack bonus on water unit.
water unit get a 25% attack bonus on air unit.
air unit get a 25% attack bonus on fire unit.
earth unit get a 15% attack bonus on fire unit.
water unit get a 15% attack bonus on earth unit.
air unit get a 15% attack bonus on water unit.
fire unit get a 15% attack bonus on air unit.
shadow unit get a 11% attack bonus on light unit.
Unit from movement type swim get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type float.
Unit from movement type float get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type walk.
Unit from movement type walk get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type fly.
Unit from movement type fly get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type swim.
Unit from movement type swim get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type fly in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type float get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type swim in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type walk get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type float in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type fly get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type walk in the afternoon.
Unit with the ethos good get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos bad.
Unit with the ethos bad get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos neutral.
Unit with the ethos neutral get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos good.
Unit with the ethos bad get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos good.
Unit with the ethos neutral get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos bad.
Unit with the ethos good get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos neutral.
